events.message: I placed my order two weeks ago, and it still hasn't arrived. The tracking info hasn't been updated for days, and I am very concerned about the delay.
The customer's issue was categorized under delivery delays based on their complaint about late shipping and tracking problems.
The case was assigned to a customer support agent specialized in order tracking and delivery issues to handle the request promptly.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand the delay with your order must be frustrating. I’m here to help you figure this out.
Could you please provide your order number and any tracking details you have so I can investigate the shipment status for you?
Sure, my order number is 123456789, and the last tracking update I see is from five days ago which states it was still in transit.
Thank you for the details. I’ve contacted the courier and found that there was an unexpected delay at their facility. Your package should arrive within the next three days.
I appreciate you looking into this and providing a clear timeline. It’s good to know my order isn’t lost and should arrive soon.
The issue has been resolved by confirming the delivery schedule with the shipping service. We will monitor the delivery to ensure it arrives on time.
Just checking in to confirm that your order has arrived as expected. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist you with.
As there have been no further issues reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
We have sent you a customer satisfaction survey to gather your feedback about how we handled your delivery delay issue.
